com.github.dexecutor.core.graph

Interface Dag<T,R>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of Node/Task ID
    R - Type of Node/Task result
    All Superinterfaces:
    DependencyAware<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultDag

    public interface Dag<T,R>
extends DependencyAware<T>
    Dependency would be constructed based on this APIs, Dexecutor uses this data structure to represent the dependencies between tasks
    Author:
    Nadeem Mohammad

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<Node<T,R>> allNodes()
      Returns all nodes in this graph
      Node<T,R> get(T id)
      Returns the node with the given id
      Set<Node<T,R>> getInitialNodes()
      Returns the Set of nodes for which there is no incoming dependencies.
      Set<Node<T,R>> getLeafNodes()
      Retruns the set of nodes for which there is no outgoing dependencies.
      Set<Node<T,R>> getNonProcessedRootNodes() 
      int size()
      Returns the total number of nodes in this graph

      • Methods inherited from interface com.github.dexecutor.core.graph.DependencyAware

        addAsDependencyToAllInitialNodes, addAsDependentOnAllLeafNodes, addDependency, addIndependent
